__e: This has been four of the most wonderful days I've ever spent.
These have been the three happiest days of my life, but--
Our father has told him before passing away
I remind you, sir, that you were in your early 20s when you first took over and your early years were not without controversy.
But it was none of those traits... that would cause so much death and pain.
Well, between political problems and health problems, even the sixties were not a good period for me.
"We'll go to an exhibit." Those were his last words.
The proudest of you all have been beholding to him in his life. Yet not one of you would once beg for his life.
Such were his words... as told to me
Her husband and son were killed.
A man and a woman were killed.
Twenty-seven years ago, today, they killed Wayne and now they came back for me.
